Translations.Text: Totus fish sea est factus lawful vos eat Intra pilgrimage hoc maius provisus pro vos intra tuus journey Vos non hunt pilgrimage Vos reverence DEUS whom vos summoned

(DEUS appointed Ka bah SANCTUS Masjid est sanctuary people ALIAS SANCTUS MENSIS offerings SANCTUS Masjid) garlands SIGNUM them! Vos know ut DEUS knows everything in caelum terra ac ut DEUS est Omniscient
Know ut DEUS est strict in enforcing retribution DEUS Forgiving Merciful
sole duty messenger est deliver message DEUS knows everything vos declare everything vos conceal
Proclaim malus bonus est non same et si abundance malus maius impress vos! Vos reverence DEUS (et vos est minoritatis) O vos possess intelligence ut vos succeed
O vos believe non ask de matters revealed vos prematurely hurt vos! Vos ask de them light de Quran they become obvious to vos. DEUS deliberately overlooked them. DEUS est Forgiver Clement
Others vos asked same questions tunc became disbelievers therein

DEUS NON prohibit livestock GENITUS EST certain combinations DE VIR FEMINA nor livestock liberated DE oath nor UNUS GENITUS EST 2 VIR row nor bull PATRIS 10. est disbelievers invented such lies DEUS. multus de them non understand
